Paid Clicks increased 18 percent for the company in the quarter, while cost-per click increased 4 percent. Google said that international revenues totaled$ 4.38 billion, 52 percent of total revenue for the quarter. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. "These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web." The
